id: {Player} open his window and jumps though it

onSuccess.displayText: Sensing something was wrong, {Player} grabs onto his bed chamber's curtains and leaps out of the window, using the curtains as a sort of rope to propel himself closer to the ground before jumping off and landing onto some bushes. {Player} isn't sure why they did it. But there was a gnawing feeling in him that he had to leave the kingdom right away.
choices: {Player} gathers supplies before leaving the kingdom
